DOC.brief_summary: This enhance meter feature raise awareness among patient provide additional information regard glycemic control Healthcare Professional visit . This information may facilitate increase dialogue patient Healthcare Professionals remind patient importance glycemic control . This study evaluate user 's ability obtain enhanced meter feature .
DOC.criteria: Type I type II diabetes inclusive follow population : 1 . Mixed insulin therapy 2 . Basal insulin therapy 3 . Continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion therapies 4 . Multiple daily injection therapy 5 . Noninsulin diabetic treatment ( oral injectable ) 6 . Life style ( exercise diet ) diabetes management 7 . New diagnosis diabetes Non diabetic Able speak read English proficiently Subjects must willing : 1. month , perform 7 point blood glucose profile course one day 2. perform fast blood glucose test every day 3. complete baseline followup questionnaires 4. consent baseline HbA1c assay Pregnant Hct < 20 > 60 Work BGM competitor company ( include , limited Lifescan , Roche , Abbott ) Homeless Incarcerated Mentally ill Employees student Research Site , include Principal Investigator , directly involve conduct protocol . Has condition Principal Investigator believe may interfere subject 's participation study .
